title: Hanyuu-sensei no Ryou Seikatsu
original_name: 羽生センセイの寮生活
sinopse:
Hanyuu Tomoki wants to be a teacher and despite being 24 years old, has a youthful appearance. One day, he receives a letter from a prestigious school and the director proposes to infiltrate the dormitory so he can watch students?!

(Source: Go-k Fansub)
